description: Contains detailed information about changes made to an AP claim.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The Change History Action category ID for the claim record. Indicates the item changed on the claim (i.e. workflow, workflow other status, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Coverage Selection for Crossover


Downstream Crossover Claim

columns.name: PREV_VAL_RAW
columns.description: The value of the item before the change was made to the claim. IDs are not translated, so if Intraconnect is used, mapping to CIDs is necessary.

columns.name: NEW_VAL_RAW
columns.description: The value of the item after the change was made to the claim. IDs are not translated, so if Intraconnect is used, mapping to CIDs is necessary.

columns.name: PREV_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The claim ID stored in the the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store claim IDs.

columns.name: NEW_CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The claim ID stored in the the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store claim IDs.

columns.name: PREV_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID stored in the the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store provider IDs.

columns.name: NEW_PROV_ID
columns.description: The provider ID stored in the the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store provider IDs.

columns.name: PREV_POS_ID
columns.description: The place of service ID stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store place of service IDs.

columns.name: NEW_POS_ID
columns.description: The place of service ID stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store place of service IDs.

columns.name: PREV_VENDOR_ID
columns.description: The vendor ID stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store vendor IDs.

columns.name: PREV_VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: NEW_VENDOR_ID
columns.description: The vendor ID stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store vendor IDs.

columns.name: NEW_VENDOR_ID_VENDOR_NAME
columns.description: The name of the vendor.

columns.name: PREV_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage ID stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store coverage IDs.

columns.name: NEW_COVERAGE_ID
columns.description: The coverage ID stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store coverage IDs.

columns.name: PREV_REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store referral IDs.

columns.name: NEW_REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: The referral ID stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store referral IDs.

columns.name: PREV_RUL_ID
columns.description: The third party pricing rule, entity or grouper ID stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store third party pricing rule, entity or grouper IDs.

columns.name: PREV_RUL_ID_RUL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the third-party pricing entity, grouper, or rule.

columns.name: NEW_RUL_ID
columns.description: The third party pricing rule, entity or grouper ID stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store third party pricing rule, entity or grouper IDs.

columns.name: NEW_RUL_ID_RUL_NAME
columns.description: The name of the third-party pricing entity, grouper, or rule.

columns.name: PREV_FRZN_STATUS_C
columns.description: The category ID of the frozen status stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store frozen status category IDs.

columns.name: NEW_FRZN_STATUS_C
columns.description: The category ID of the frozen status stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store frozen status category IDs.

columns.name: PREV_HELD_FOR_AP_RSN_C
columns.description: The category ID of the held for AP reason stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store held for AP reason category IDs.

columns.name: NEW_HELD_FOR_AP_RSN_C
columns.description: The category ID of the held for AP reason stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store held for AP reason category IDs.

columns.description: The category ID of the place of service type stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store place of service type category IDs.

columns.name: NEW_CLAIM_SPEC_C

columns.name: PREV_OVRIDE_DISALW_AMT_RSN_C
columns.description: The category ID of the override disallow amount reason stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store override disallow amount reason category IDs.

columns.description: The category ID of the override disallow amount reason stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store override disallow amount reason category IDs.

columns.name: PREV_OVRIDE_ALLOW_AMT_RSN_C

columns.name: PREV_TYPE_OF_SERVICE_C
columns.description: The category ID of the type of service stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store type of service category IDs.

columns.name: NEW_TYPE_OF_SERVICE_C
columns.description: The category ID of the type of service stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store type of service category IDs.

columns.name: PREV_WORKFLOW_C
columns.description: The category ID of the claim workflow stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store claim workflow category IDs.

columns.name: NEW_WORKFLOW_C
columns.description: The category ID of the claim workflow stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store claim workflow category IDs.

columns.name: PREV_VAL_YN
columns.description: The Yes/No value stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store Yes/No values.

columns.name: NEW_VAL_YN
columns.description: The Yes/No value stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store Yes/No values.

columns.name: PREV_NDC_ID
columns.description: The NDC code ID stored in the item before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store NDC code IDs.

columns.name: PREV_NDC_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: NEW_NDC_ID
columns.description: The NDC code ID stored in the item after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store NDC code IDs.

columns.name: NEW_NDC_ID_NDC_CODE
columns.description: The external code for the National Drug Code (NDC). An NDC represents packages of medications.

columns.name: PREV_NDC_UNITS_C
columns.description: The category ID of the NDC Units before the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store NDC Units category IDs.

columns.name: NEW_NDC_UNITS_C
columns.description: The category ID of the NDC Units after the change was made to the claim. This column only contains data for items that store NDC Units category IDs.
